H0.text: What was the scene of the final defeat of the Jacobites under Charles Edward by forces under the command of the Duke of Cumberland on 16 April 1746. Falkirk

H1.text: What was the scene of the final defeat of the Jacobites under Charles Edward by forces under the command of the Duke of Cumberland on 16 April 1746. Stirling

H2.text: What was the scene of the final defeat of the Jacobites under Charles Edward by forces under the command of the Duke of Cumberland on 16 April 1746. Inverness

H3.text: What was the scene of the final defeat of the Jacobites under Charles Edward by forces under the command of the Duke of Cumberland on 16 April 1746. Culloden

A4.text: The Battle of Culloden took place on 16 April 1746, near Inverness, in the Scottish Highlands.

A5.text: The Jacobite army assembled on the Culloden estate on 15 April 1746 before the battle on 16 April.
